mapper.update: update Admin_Administrator set RoleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AdminAccount = #{adminaccount,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, AdminPassword = #{adminpassword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, AdminPasswordSalt = #{adminpasswordsalt,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AdminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select AdminID, RoleID, AdminAccount, AdminPassword, AdminPasswordSalt, CreateTime from Admin_Administrator
